metadata.title: CVE-2016-5703 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: SQL injection vulnerability in libraries/central_columns.lib.php inphpMyAdmin 4.4.x before 4.4.15.7 and 4.6.x before 4.6.3 allows remoteattackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via a crafted database namethat is mishandled in a central column query.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
